In the mid 1970s, Leslie relocated to the Mill Valley area in California and began performing in adult films.  His first film was Coming Attractions. He was a performer in almost 300 adult films and won numerous awards during his days as a performer. He appeared with some of the era's most noted porn stars, including fellow Ohioans Traci Lords and John "Johnny Wadd" Holmes, as well as Seka, Kay Parker, and Annette Haven.
